DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Information Source Type Code OMOP CDM Measurement Type Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._A coded value specifying an identifiable class of an entity or activity based on common qualities._A foreign key to the predefined Concept in the Standardized Vocabularies reflecting the provenance from where the Measurement record was recorded.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created manually for CDM 8.24.18 mc. Updated Property to be consistent with annotation of properties that are codes.

ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP CDM Measurement Type Concept Identifier
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key to the predefined Concept in the Standardized Vocabularies reflecting the provenance from where the Measurement record was recorded.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model

DataElement.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model
DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and OMOP value set for CDM.
